fields.title: probabilistic PCA
fields.pointers:
*  [Probabilistic latent semantic analysis (pLSA)](probabilistic_lsa)  is another probabilistic model similar to PCA, but better geared toward discrete data. 
*  [Bayesian PCA](bayesian_pca)  is a Bayesian version of pPCA.
fields.summary: Probabilistic principal component analysis (PCA) is a formulation of PCA as a latent variable model. Each data point is assumed to be generated as a linear function of Gaussian latent variables, plus noise. Like PCA, it has a closed form solution in terms of the truncated SVD of the covariance matrix.
